title: WildFly 32.0.1 is released!
content: WildFly 32.0.1.Final is now available .  It’s been about five weeks since the WildFly 32 release, so we’ve done a small bug fix update, WildFly 32.0.1. This includes an update to WildFly Preview.  The following issues were resolved in 32.0.1:  BUGS   * [] - ClassCastException when running live-only HA policy in    messaging-activemq subsystem   * [] - LinkageError: loader constraint violation for class io.netty.*   * [] - Deploying multiple OpenAPI endpoints can result in a    NoSuchElementException   * [] - OpenTelemetryDependencyProcessor should add io.smallrye.opentelemetry to    deployment classpath  TASKS   * [] - Add LICENSE and other community documents to widfly-archetypes   * [] - Make the testsuite/galleon tests appropriately scoped  COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade Infinispan to 14.0.28.Final   * [] - Upgrade JGroups to 5.2.25.Final   * [] - Upgrade RESTEasy to 6.2.9.Final   * [] - Upgrade WildFly Core to 24.0.1.Final  Issues resolved in the WildFly Core update included with WildFly 32.0.1 were:  BUGS   * [] - [CVE-2024-4029] wildfly-domain-http: wildfly: No timeout for EAP    management interface may lead to Denial of Service (DoS)  TASKS   * [] - Rename Installer.Builder.async() -> Installer.Builder.blocking()  COMPONENT UPGRADES   * [] - Upgrade BouncyCastle from 1.78 to 1.78.1   * [] - Upgrade WildFly Elytron to 2.4.2.Final   * [] - Upgrade XNIO to 3.8.15.Final  Enjoy!
